contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=August 2009}} [[File:Map.Yuzukami-Vill.Tochigi.PNG|thumb|Map of Yuzukami, Tochigi]] {{nihongo|'''Yuzukami'''|湯津上村|Yuzukami-mura}} was a [[villages of Japan|village]] located in [[Nasu District, Tochigi|Nasu District]], [[Tochigi Prefecture|Tochigi]], [[Japan]]. On October 1, 2005 Yuzukami, along with the town of [[Kurobane, Tochigi|Kurobane]], also from [[Nasu District, Tochigi|Nasu District]], was merged into the expanded city of [[Ōtawara, Tochigi|Ōtawara]]. As of 2003, the village had an estimated [[population]] of 5,225 and a [[population density|density]] of 159.88 persons per km². The total area was 32.68 km². ==External links== * [http://www.city.ohtawara.tochigi.jp/ Ōtawara official website] {{ja icon}} [[Category:Dissolved municipalities of Tochigi Prefecture]] {{Tochigi-geo-stub}}
